fields.name: guiLayers
fields.description: Contains the *extra* GUI layers. The current top layer stays in Minecraft#currentScreen, and the rest serve as a background for it.

methods.name: copyModelProperties
methods.description: Copies humanoid model properties from the original model to another, used for armor models

methods.name: fillNormal
methods.description: internal, relies on fixed format of FaceBakery

methods.name: getEntityRenderType
methods.description: Mimics the behavior of ItemBlockRenderTypes.getRenderType(BlockState, boolean) for the input RenderType .

methods.name: fixItemModelSeams
methods.description: Modify the position and UVs of the edge quads of generated item models to account for sprite expansion of the front and back quad. Fixes MC-73186 on generated item models.

methods.name: fireRenderFramePre
methods.description: Fires RenderFrameEvent.Pre . Called just before GameRenderer.render(float, long, boolean) in Minecraft.runTick(boolean) . Fired before the profiler section for "gameRenderer" is started.

methods.name: fireRenderFramePost
methods.description: Fires RenderFrameEvent.Post . Called just after GameRenderer.render(float, long, boolean) in Minecraft.runTick(boolean) . Fired after the profiler section for "gameRenderer" is ended.

methods.name: fireClientTickPre
methods.description: Fires ClientTickEvent.Pre . Called from the head of Minecraft.tick() .

methods.name: fireClientTickPost
methods.description: Fires ClientTickEvent.Post . Called from the tail of Minecraft.tick() .
